data.title: GU Admissions
data.text:
Students and parents/guardians are advised to visit the web-pages of particular departments and colleges for necessary information.

Keep ready all documents and information required to submit along with the Application Form.

An applicant can apply to one Traditional Course and two Interdisciplinary Courses only. Please check the list of Traditional and Interdisciplinary Courses.

The Application Form for Admission is editable, but once you finally submit, it will no longer be editable.

You can submit the form even if your result is not declared.

The Email ID and phone number of the students and parents/guardians may be used for further communication.

Please check the eligibility conditions before submission of the Online Application Form.

The provisional merit list of students will be published in the University website (this site) only.

Appearance of your name in the provisional merit list is not a guarantee of your admission. It depends on fulfilment of eligibility conditions and intake capacity of the department/colleges for the concerned Course.

All are advised to keep visiting this website for any update regarding the Admission process from time to time.

The University is not responsible for any unwanted technical failure which may disturb the admission process, either at the University end, or from the studentâ€™s end.

All prospective applicants can apply for one Traditional Course and a maximum of Two Interdisciplinary Course. It is extremely IMPORTANT that an applicant should apply to all three courses (if any) from one Login ID and the registration fee has to be paid together for all the three courses. If an applicant applies to multiple courses from different registration sessions (using different Login IDs), they will NOT be able to appear in the PGET 2023. In such cases, the Registration Fee paid WILL NOT be refunded.
